Megatron tries desperatly to dodge the missiles, nimbly making it out of
the way of one of the rocket shells. The other however hits him in the
feet sending him spiralling backwards, as he desperatly clutches
Skullgrin. Megatron wanted to return to the battlefield, but a call from
Switchblade calmed his nerves. " Excellent Switchblade, I will rendevous
with you there." He turned, and shakily began to fly towards Mexico.
